.. _api-reference:

API Reference
============================================

This reference manual details functions, modules, and objects included in NumPy, describing what they are and what they do. For learning how to use NumPy, see the :ref:`complete documentation <main>`.

   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:

   auth
   client
   client_factory
   downloader
   engines
   error
   func_facade
   profile
   validator
